org.fluentjdbc.DbContextSaveBuilder

Packages that use DbContextSaveBuilder
Package
Description
org.fluentjdbc
Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

  • Uses of DbContextSaveBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

    Description
    DbContextSaveBuilder<Long>
    DbContextTable.newSaveBuilder(String idColumn, Long idValue)
    Creates a DbContextSaveBuilder which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database.
